who_we_are.title: Who We Are
who_we_are.content: We're a vibrant community of young, passionate developers aiming to build cool stuff and learn together.

what_we_do.title: What We Do
what_we_do.content: We collaborate on real-world projects, offer mentorship, and help each other grow in the tech ecosystem.

our_team.title: Our Team
our_team.content: Our team includes developers, designers, and dreamers who work together to bring our ideas to life.

our_goals.title: Our Goals
our_goals.content: To empower youth through technology, foster innovation, and make tech fun and accessible to everyone.
